attributes.action: Remove fines for parents taking children on school term-time family holidays
attributes.background: In 2013 the government changed the rules related to childrens absence from school. This resulted in two options for parents take a child out and risk a fine or pay a higher holiday cost. Both options cost working parents and are not workable. Sign this petition let's debate this issue in parliament.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104338

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
